name: Trajosko Drom
goal: Roma inclusion, minority rights and gender equality. The organisation has a rights based approach and works against discrimination of and for the realisation of Human Rights for each and every individual.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
Report on fundamental rights aspects in Roma integration in the EU: fighting anti-Gypsyism
(2017/2038(INI))

The Roma Civil Monitor project – ‘Capacity building for Roma civil society and strengthening its involvement in themonitoring of national Roma integration strategies’ (JUST/2014/RPPI/PR/EQUA/0150)
